channel.title: New to Coding and I need some help :)
channel.description:
Hey guys, Im new to RSPS coding, and I need some help... I was wondering if anyone could teach me how to code a 317 server? I don't want to sound like a beggar, but I am willing to pay a certain amount of money for someone to teach me.
I have coded websites yet I have never launched them. I have also only ever used Sources for 613/614, and 562 servers...
-PS: Also if anyone has Skype and is willing to help that'll make it a lot easier :)
Thanks :cool:

item.title: New to Coding and I need some help :)
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

If you thought Moparisthebest could help you, you obviously haven’t read any of the rules.

Read full topic
